languages.text: {n}Голова сервитора поворачивается к вам. Из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}, вмонтированного в его горло, доносится надсадный скрежет, после чего безмозглые конструкты приходят в единое движение и бросаются на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Голова сервитора поворачивается к вам. Из вокса, вмонтированного в его горло, доносится надсадный скрежет, после чего безмозглые конструкты приходят в единое движение и бросаются на вас.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Голова сервитора поворачивается к вам. Из {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокса{/g}, вмонтированного в его горло, доносится надсадный скрежет, после чего безмозглые конструкты приходят в единое движение и бросаются на вас.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Servitor's head turns to you. The vox built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

{n}The Servitor's head turns to you. The vox built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

{n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

{n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

{n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

{n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}那个机仆把头转向了你，喉咙中内置的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统发出了紧张的尖叫声。听到这个声音，其他的机仆以完美的同步节奏跳动起来，朝你扑了过来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}那个奴工把头转向了你，喉咙中内置的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵{/g}系统发出了紧张的尖叫声。听到这个声音，其他的奴工以完美的同步节奏跳动起来，朝你扑了过来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La cabeza del servidor se gira hacia ti. El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} que tiene en la garganta emite un chirrido tenso y, al unísono, las descerebradas unidades entran en acción abalanzándose sobre ti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La cabeza del servidor se gira hacia ti. El {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voco{/g} que tiene en la garganta emite un chirrido tenso y, al unísono, las descerebradas unidades entran en acción abalanzándose sobre ti.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターがこちらに顔を向ける。喉に埋め込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}がキンとつんざくような音を上げた瞬間、動きを完璧にシンクロさせて、脳みそのないその機械達がドドッとこちらに突進してきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターがこちらに顔を向ける。喉に埋め込まれた{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクス{/g}がキンとつんざくような音を上げた瞬間、動きを完璧にシンクロさせて、脳みそのないその機械達がドドッとこちらに突進してきた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Kopf des Servitors wendet sich dir zu. Das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} in seiner Kehle erzeugt ein langes kreischendes Geräusch, woraufhin die hirnlosen Konstrukte sich perfekt synchronisiert auf dich stürzen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Kopf des Servitors wendet sich dir zu. Das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox{/g} in seiner Kehle erzeugt ein langes kreischendes Geräusch, woraufhin die hirnlosen Konstrukte sich perfekt synchronisiert auf dich stürzen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le servitor tourne la tête vers vous. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} de sa gorge laisse échapper un son strident, puis les créations artificielles dépourvues de toute fonction cérébrale se jettent sur vous dans un même mouvement parfaitement synchronisé.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor tourne la tête vers vous. Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} de sa gorge laisse échapper un son strident, puis les créations artificielles dépourvues de toute fonction cérébrale se jettent sur vous dans un même mouvement parfaitement synchronisé.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörün başı sana dönüyor. Boğazına yerleştirilen {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vokstan{/g} gergin bir ciyaklama sesi çıktığı anda beyinsiz yapılar, mükemmel bir uyum içinde harekete geçip sana saldırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor's head turns to you. The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox{/g} built into its throat lets out a strained screeching sound, at which point, in perfect sync, the brainless constructs spring into motion and lunge at you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetörün başı sana dönüyor. Boğazına yerleştirilen {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks{/g}tan gergin bir ciyaklama sesi çıktığı anda beyinsiz yapılar, mükemmel bir uyum içinde harekete geçip sana saldırıyor.{/n}
